definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[שׁרשׁ]] (appar. √ of foll.; Di:Job 40:16 Buhl al. think = [[שׁרשׁר]], √ [[שׁרר]], cf. [[שׁׂר]], etc., Eth. 3rw: nerve, muscle, whence [[שׁׂרֶשׁ]] as root-fibre, but word very ancient, and this der,quite unproven; <Schwally:ZMG iii (1898), 140 f. cp. Ar. 4arsun (4 by dissimilation), thorn-bush, 4arsun hard, rough, rugged (of ground), 4arisa ill-natured, cross; hence [[שׁׂרֶשׁ]], from tough, gnarled root-fibres; NH and Ph. [[שרש]], As. šuršu, all root, Sab. [[שרס]] (v. Ar. supr.) root, foundation Hom:Chr 124, [[אשרס]] foundation DHM:AMG xxix (1875), 606; xxxvii (1883), 415; Aram. [[שׁוֹרְשָׁא]], 4er4o0 root).
